head.title: Aloha for Six Citrus Sweet Potatoes

directions.step:
Peel and cut sweet potatoes into 1/4-inch thick slices; arrange, overlapping slightly, in a single layer in 13x9 inch baking dish. Combine orange rind and juice, grapefruit juice, sugar, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper; pour evenly over sweet potatoes. Cover tightly with foil; bake in 375F=190C oven for 40 minutes. Uncover and bake, basting every 10 minutes, for about 30 minutes longer or until sweet potatoes are tender and glazed.
Per serving: 220 calories, 2 g protein, 4 g fat, 45 g carbohydrate high source fibre
